duties_responsibilities.duty: Remove cases from full pallets and place them by layers onto the trays in the Automated Case Pick System.
Operate robots, clear faults, and assure pallet integrity within the shipping area.
Confirm accuracy of product while maintaining production levels and quality.
Inspect and ensure the stability of product on pallets.
Maintain physical endurance, including standing, bending, pulling, lifting, and pivoting throughout shifts.
Walk between 6-12 miles per day on various surfaces including concrete, tile, and carpet.
Frequently lift product weighing between 1 - 60 lbs. or more and handle sharp objects including box cutting tools.

education_certification.credential: General Equivalency Diploma or High School Diploma
